text: Soni munkumbuchilani (Hudu) nnongo n’jao achina Adi; ndema jaŵatetele ŵandu ŵakwe pa Al-Ahqâf (chiŵata chamasugulu ga nsanga kumwela kwa chilumba cha Ŵarabu), soni chisimu ŵaapiite akutetela ŵajinji paujo pakwe ni panyuma pakwe; (ni jwasalile kuti): “Ngasin’galagatila (jwinepe) akaŵeje Allah, chisimu une ngun’jogopela jenumanja ilagasyo ya lisiku lyekulungwa nnope.”
